question: What are the names of mentioned capital improvement projects?
raw_answer: City Hall Roof Replacement, Storm Drain Trash Screens, Dumetz Drive and Fernhill Drive Speed Humps Project.
evidence_answer: City Hall Roof Replacement, Annual Street Maintenance, Dume Drive and Fernhill Drive Speed Humps Project, Civic Center Stormwater Diversion Structure, PCH Median Improvements Project
extracted_search_list: Dumetz Drive and Fernhill Drive Speed Humps Project
searched_docs:
(cid:190) Project Schedule: August 2020 through March 2021

Capital Improvement Projects (Completed)

Storm Drain Trash Screens

(cid:190) Project Description: This project consisted of installing trash screens in City
owned catch basins.

The proposed trash screens will reduce the amount of
trash from being discharged into the ocean.

(cid:131) Consultant is working on final design documents. (cid:190) Project Schedule:

overall project costs.

Portions of the
curb and gutter have been placed and the contactor is working on the
proposed retaining wall.

(cid:131) The contractor is also working on the curb, gutter and storm drain
installation on Civic Center Way from Webb Way to the condos.

(cid:190) Project Schedule

(cid:131) Complete Design: Spring 2021
(cid:131) Begin Construction: Summer/Fall 2021

guardrail throughout the City as a result of the Woolsey Fire.
